text: is a Japanese footballer, playing as a defender for Nagoya Grampus in J1 League. ==Career== ===Kashiwa Reysol=== Nakatani made his official debut for Kashiwa Reysol in the J. League Division 1, on 22 October 2014 against Gamba Osaka in Kashiwa Hitachi Stadium in Kashiwa, Japan. He started and played the full match. Nakatani and his club lost the match 1-0. After five years as a pro in Kashiwa, Nakatani switched mid-season to Nagoya Grampus in June 2018. ==Club career statistics== Updated to 21 February 2019.Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑ハンディ版 2018 (NSK MOOK)", 7 February 2018, Japan, (p. 32 out of 289)Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "2017 J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑 (NSK MOOK)", 8 February 2017, Japan, (p. 64 out of 289) {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | League Cup ! colspan=2 | Continental ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
